00044 // LONG TYPE DEFINITION, ADDED BY CLAUDIO 01/14/05
00045 #ifndef _LONGLONG_DEF
00046 typedef unsigned long long ULONGLONG;
00047 typedef long long LONGLONG;
00048 #define _LONGLONG_DEF
00049 #endif

00056 typedef struct
00057 {
00058         H_FILE  handle;
00059 } FILE;
00060 
00061 // open file list handling < ibl ; 2005-02-06 >
00062 
00063 typedef struct _open_list_entry {
00064         FILE *file;
00065         struct _open_list_entry *next;
00066 } OPEN_LIST_ENTRY;

00084 
00085 // fseek() replaced with macro for code size optimization < ibl; 2005-04-30 >
00086 // int fseek (FILE *f, long offset, int mode);
00087 #define fseek(fp,ofs,mode) kos_fseek((fp)->handle,(S32)(ofs),(U32)(mode))

00189 // Stripped down Integer versions of *printf
00190 // These are lacking floating point formats
00191 
00192 int iprintf(const char *fmt, ...);
00193 int isprintf(char *out, const char *fmt, ...);
00194 int ivsprintf(char *out,const char *fmt, va_list argp);
00195 int ifprintf(FILE *f, const char *fmt, ...);

00198 #ifdef TINY_PRINTF
00199 #define printf iprintf
00200 #define sprintf isprintf
00201 #define vsprintf ivsprintf
00202 #define fprintf ifprintf
00203 #endif
